notes: Conditional logic via Python control flow

components.name: Extract Death Records
components.description: Fetches death record metadata and downloads multiple death data files from the data.gouv.fr API.

components.name: Extract Nuclear Plants
components.description: Fetches nuclear power plant metadata and extracts CSV data from the data.gouv.fr API.

components.name: Extract Thermal Plants
components.description: Fetches thermal power plant metadata and extracts CSV data from the data.gouv.fr API.

components.name: Extract City Geo Data
components.description: Downloads city geographic coordinates mapping data from the static.data.gouv.fr CSV endpoint.

components.name: Load Death Records to Redis
components.description: Loads death records from ingestion files into Redis with deduplication.

components.name: Cleanse Death Data
components.description: Transforms death records with geographic mapping and date formatting.

components.name: Cleanse Power Plant Data
components.description: Cleans and transforms power plant data with column standardization.

components.name: Create Power Plant Table
components.description: Creates the target database table for power plant data in PostgreSQL.

components.name: Create Death Table
components.description: Creates the target database table for death records in PostgreSQL.

components.name: Generate Plant Insert Queries
components.description: Generates SQL insertion queries for power plant data.

components.name: Check Death Data Emptiness
components.description: Checks if death data processing produced valid SQL queries.

components.name: Store Deaths in PostgreSQL
components.description: Executes death data insertion into PostgreSQL.

components.name: Store Plants in PostgreSQL
components.description: Executes power plant data insertion into PostgreSQL.

components.name: Clean Temporary Death Files
components.description: Cleans up temporary death data from Redis and the file system.

name.constraints: Must be a unique identifier for the pipeline

batch_window.description: Batch window parameter name (e.g., ds, execution_date)

partitioning.description: Data partitioning strategy (e.g., daily, hourly, monthly)

depends_on_past.description: Whether execution depends on previous run success

DEATH_DATASET_ID.description: API ID for death records dataset

max_resource.description: Maximum number of resources to fetch

NUCLEAR_DATASET_ID.description: API ID for nuclear power plant dataset

THERMAL_DATASET_ID.description: API ID for thermal power plant dataset

CITY_GEO_DATASET_URL.description: URL for city geographic coordinates mapping data

city_geo_loc_file.description: Path to city geographic coordinates file

thermal_plants_file.description: Path to thermal power plant data file

nuclear_plants_file.description: Path to nuclear power plant data file

sql_file.description: Path to SQL schema file for power plant table
Path to SQL schema file for death table

thermal_plants_file.description: Path to thermal power plant data file

nuclear_plants_file.description: Path to nuclear power plant data file

output_sql_file.description: Path to output SQL insertion queries file

death_insertion_queries_path.description: Path to death insertion queries file

sql_file.description: Path to SQL insertion queries file for death records
Path to SQL insertion queries file for power plant data

sql_query_files_directory.description: Directory for temporary SQL query files

SQL_QUERY_FILES_DIRECTORY.description: Directory for temporary SQL query files

sources: data.gouv.fr API for death records, nuclear plants, and thermal plants
static.data.gouv.fr for city geographic coordinates mapping data
sinks: PostgreSQL database for storing death records and power plant data
